option.od: print the help message and exit.
filenames of the fit format files.
files are in the fitacf format.
filename of the fitacf format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Tests the integrity of fit or fitacf format files by reading them and printing the contents.

description.p: Tests the integrity of fit or fitacf format files by reading them and printing the contents.
The contents are written to standard output

example.description: Test the integrity of the file "20040830.gbr.fit", paginating using more.
